creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: narrow, tall mountains and irregular rock formations dotted with foliage in background; large, tall rock formation with irregular edges and dense dots of foliage at L with small figure seated at flat top; small pavilion on rock formation at R; figures in boat at lower center

title: Landscape with Distant Peaks
